document.full_text: security forces killed more than 60 people across syria on friday during demonstrations demanding the ouster of president bashar al-assad, and the united states imposed new sanctions on key figures.
document.title: syrian forces kill 62, u.s. toughens sanctions
lines_and_colors: security forces killed more than 60 people across syria on friday during demonstrations demanding the ouster of president bashar al-assad, and the united states imposed new sanctions on key figures.
